word:
Let not our ministers dwell upon commonplace matters in their discourses. Now is a time when there should be a humbling of the heart before God. Seek Him while He is to be found on the pardoning side, and not on the judgment side. Wake up, my brethren and sisters in Australia. You have no time to lose. Call upon the Lord while He may be found.--Ms 61a, 1906 (MR 900.36). 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. November 5, 1985. Entire Ms
